rules_text:
Prowess
[i]Prodigy[/i] – Whenever Delthea, Free Spirit deals damage, put a +1/+1 counter on her.
[i]Thoron[/i] – Remove X number of counters from among creatures you control: Delthea deals X damage to target creature, planeswalker or battle. Activate this only once each turn and only on your turn.
